resources.string: Add a waypoint to all the tracks

string.name: menu_record_track
string.translation_description:
In the menu, to start recording a track.
Screenshot: menu_record_track.png

string.name: menu_settings
string.translation_description:
In the menu, to go to the settings page.
Screenshot: menu_record_track_more.png

string.name: menu_stop_recording
string.translation_description:
In the menu, to stop recording a track.
Screenshot: menu_stop_recording.png
